subject: Economy
question_en: What is the role of Gross Domestic Product (GDP) in measuring economic growth?
question_hi: ग्रॉस कामयाबी (GDP) क्या विकास के मूल्यवर्धक मानना है।
A_en: GDP is used to measure the overall economic activity in a country.
A_hi: देश में कोई क्या करने की क्षमता को GDP (ग्रॉस कामयाबी) मानने का उपयोग करते हैं।
B_en: GDP is used to measure the value of all goods and services produced in a country.
C_en: GDP is used to measure the level of economic activity and development in a country.
C_hi: देश में कोई आर्थिति और विकलिका परिक्षण मानता है।
D_en: GDP is used to measure the overall economic performance of a country.
D_hi: देश की कोई एकान्तीना प्रतिकृति परिक्षण मानता है।
E_en: GDP is used to measure the level of economic development in a country.
E_hi: देश कोई विकलिका परिक्षण मानता है।
F_en: GDP is used to compare the economic performance of different countries.
F_hi: देशों की कोई परिक्षण मानता है।
G_en: GDP is used to analyze the growth and development of an economy.
G_hi: देश की प्रतिका परिक्षण मानता है।
H_en: GDP is used to track the progress and performance of an economy over time.
I_en: GDP is used to evaluate the efficiency of a government's economic policies.
J_en: GDP is used to measure the growth of an economy.
K_en: GDP is used to compare the economic performance of two or more countries.
L_en: GDP is used to determine the growth rate of an economy.
M_en: GDP is used to evaluate the overall economic status of a country.
N_en: GDP is used to measure the standard of living of a population.
O_en: GDP is used to compare the economic status of different regions within a country.
O_hi: देश की कालकर, देशों की कालकर
P_en: GDP is used to assess the growth rate of an economy over a specific period.
Q_en: GDP is used to measure the economic well-being of a country.
R_en: GDP is used to evaluate the overall economic performance of a country.
R_hi: देश की कालकर की विक्षपाना है।
S_en: GDP is used to determine the economic status of a region.
T_en: GDP is used to assess the progress of an economy.
U_en: GDP is used to measure the overall development level of a country.
W_en: GDP helps to understand the economic growth of a region.
X_en: GDP is used to evaluate the economic conditions of a region.
Y_en: GDP helps to measure the economic health of a country.
Z_en: GDP is used to assess the economic situation of a region.
aa_en: GDP helps in understanding the financial condition of a country.
ba_en: GDP is utilized to evaluate the economic growth of a region.
ca_en: GDP helps to measure the economic performance of a country.
